title: Shyv's dragon form looks too much like a wyvern, So here is a concept art of what she should be
body:
[](http://img10.deviantart.net/e984/i/2015/287/c/5/red_dragon_by_sandara-d6hpycs.jpg)
https://www.sciencenews.org/sites/default/files/main/blogposts/wt_giraffeneck_free.jpg

(Too anyone not in the know Giraffes were considered dragons in china when the chinese first discovered them. They were called Kirin.)

replies.body: Except Wyverns ARE a type of dragon.

If Monster Hunter is to be believed, Unicorns are also dragons.
http://i.imgur.com/yzo7c2P.png?noredirect
"Elder Dragon" Kirin

Seriously though kirins are giraffes.
Changed over time of course to be drawn as dragons. but they started out as fucking giraffes.

Wyverns are indeed dragons.
was poking fun at people getting butthurt about shyv being called a wyvern and not a dragon.
